column1: I was having a few break outs and couldn't find a skin routine to help, I don't like to use acne meds, when I saw all the natural ingredients I wanted to give it a shot! I use this night and day and like other uses said, it does feel heavy at first on the skin, but give it a minute! Let it soak in! My skin is feeling great and the tone is evening out, even though this isn't a claim of the product. I love it! Please don't discontinue!!

I usually dislikemoisturizers because they feel like a heavy layer over my skin and it takes ages to absorb, but this absorbes almost instantly and leaves my skin feeling refreshed. Unlike traditional moisturizers which give a oily look to your face before it's absorbed, This one gives a really beautiful natural glow to your face. I worried about the strong smell at first but when it's on your face you can't even smell it.

This moisturizer is amazing! I use it as both a day and night mask. I also love that the ingredients are 97% vegan. This product makes my complexion very bright and I've received several compliments. I always refer them to this product because it's just that amazing.

In general, I love Garnier products for both hair and skin. Since I suffer from rosacea, I'm always looking for skin care products. I maintain real aloe plants but it's messy and impractical. This product is pretty good after a week of twice daily use. My redness is diminished.

I'd like to point out that several other Garnier products have worked for my rosacea and then they stop making them. Please don't stop making products that calm and cool skin. Rosacea is hard to treat.

I like the idea of no mineral oil but this cream does have a very runny consistency and after I apply it, it turns sticky. But it has a nice refreshing smell, much better than the one with rose water.

I've been using this product for several weeks now. I like that it feels light, smells night and isn't greasy. However, after I apply and it soaks in, my skins "rolls" off in sheets when I run my finger across my face. Which in turn makes my make up extremely patchy, even a day after application. I don't think I'll continue using this product.

This product didn't add any moisture to my face all it did was leave a sticky feeling all day highly disappointed expected better I I would even use a small amount leaves your face feeling stiff even after i wash off

I have sensitive combination skin. I bought this moisturizer a couple weeks ago because I thought the aloe would help my winter dryness. This product made my skin 10x worse, my face is now cracking and flaking off. I wish I read there was salicylic acid and other drying chemicals before I used it. It smells good though and feels nice when it's on!

my mom got this for me when i told her i needed a moisturizer after my face started peeling because it was so dry during the winter months. within a week of using this my face has been hydrated as ever and i'm very impressed with the results. my skin isn't too sensitive but it doesn't seem to contain any ingredients that don't agree with my skin type. also a plus, it doesn't make your face feel greasy and/or oily. love it!

I just bought this yesterday and so far I love how it made my skin feel so soft and moisturized while using only a little bit of product. A little definitely goes a long way with this product due to it's consistency. The only thing I didn't like about it was the smell. I do love that its 97% naturally and a vegan product. I would definitely recommend it for dry skin.

Bought this because I my skin was scaly from the winter air! Loved how nourishing it was, but if you rub it in to your skin, it takes out what's in your pores.... Love my pores being cleaned, but not sure it's supposed to do that.
This product really helped fix my winter dry skin. I loved how great my skin felt when I woke up in the morning after leaving a thick layer overnight.

I was looking for something for extra moisture for the winter. This is it! I picked this up and am enjoying the added hydration this is adding to my face both morning and evening. I like that I can apply it extra thick as a mask as well.

Omg this moisturizer has made my skin feel so smooth. Normally they leave my face oily or dry but I didn't have any oil on my skin or anything plus i don't need a lot on my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was very happy to find a low cost mineral oil free face moisturiser, and I do love aloe but This does not seam to soak into my skin and feels greasy after application. feels lite and fresh on my hand but tacky on the skin. No results noted just an overly sticky oily feeling.
I use this at night and my face feels so moisturized. I love it .

I been using this for almost 2 weeks. I love it as a day and night moisturizer. I would giving this 5 stars but when for the first time trying to use it as a mask it burn little. And the mask instructions weren't clear. I have sensitive skin and that light irish skin. But overall it was amazing I love it and will still use it as a day and night moisturizer cream only.

I did not feel this product lived up to its claims of being fast-absorbing and non greasy. Left me feeling like I needed to immediately wash my face. It was, however, gentle enough that I did not have a problem with skin irritation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Honestly, I was extremely surprised by this product. I have a lot of allergies and my skin is super sensitive so I was a little hesitant to try this, BUT I am so glad I got the chance to try this. My skin is feeling so great right now. It feels renewed, it's hydrated without being oily. I use this mostly as a mask and I've had no issues with break outs or oily skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been trying this moisturizer out for about a month now and it's anazing. I have sensitive skin so a lot of products turn my face red and it ends up feeling greasy. Not this. My face feels great, I'm not breaking out. It smells amazing! Not too much that the smells overwhelms. I definitely would recommend this to others! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is made with natural ingredients, and it felt light on my skin. I have oily skin and thankfully this moisturizer didn't make my face oiler than it already is. This is one of the best moisturizers I've ever used. It works as it claims and it leaves my skin velvety smooth!. It has a pleasant smell but I wish it had a different fragrance but overall is a very good moisturizer!. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aloe Hydrating 3-in-1 Moisturizer Is amazing it feel really nice on your skin an my skin is really sensitive but this really works it didn't even break out my skin looking to buy this [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I think this products works great for my oily skin it smooths it out and keeps away black heads and most of my pimples. This is a great product . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this and have used it for a few weeks, I loved it and then my cheeks were covered with raised bumpy breakouts. I'm so embarrassed as I haven't had anything like this since I was a teenager. Back to the drawing board to find a good face cream

I love how smooth and silky my skin feels after using this moisturizer. It works well with my combination skin without making me shiny, and yet mositurizes the dry spots that tend to peel. Just ensure to rub it all in, otherwise it becomes the mask and will peel - I usually rub the leftover into my hands/cuticles! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the fact that this is a very hydrating moisturizer without feeling too heavy on. The smell is nice and natural without being too strong, and a little bit will go a long way. It is very gentle and doesn't irritate my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is a game changer for me. I used it every other morning and night. It left my skin feeling so soft and smooth. The consistency was creamy yet not oily like others I have tried. It didn't break me out and I loved that. I didn't enjoy the smell but it wasn't unbearable for me. I would definitely recommend trying the Garnier SkinActive Hydrating 3 in 1 moisturizer with Aloe to anyone with dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When you first open the jar of this moisturizer is smells so heavenly and it's very very light weight. I have combination skin so I don't need thing to oil or dry. The is the the perfect moisturizer it's non-oily and the aloe soothes my skin especially living in Texas we are prone to face drying out so often. It is so awesome I even used it on other places. Also when you apply a thick layer at night you wake up with your face feeling so smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think it's an awesome product. It's non greasy feeling makes your skin feel smooth and hydrated without the clogged pore feeling and it's very light cream compared to others I have used. It doesn't consume much time at all to use this product whether it's used morning and night or as a mask which I tried both. It doesn't have much of a scent except for the aloe smell. I definitely would recommend this product especially it being all natural with a fresh feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the way this smells! My skin is very sensitive and I haven't had any sensitivities to it. The aloe is very calming and I love that you can use it daily or as a mask. My favorite part is that it is mostly all natural products! It moisturizes well under my make up (better than another high end product), and didnt cause any break outs for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive Hydrating 3-in-1 Aloe Moisturizer is amazing! I love the smell and the cool feeling on your skin. My skin is so soft and smooth now. I enjoy using it as a hydrating mask and as a moisturizer in the morning before putting on makeup and at night before bed. I would recommend this to anyone who needs hydration but still wants it to be gentle. Also it smells great! Love it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier Skin Active Aloe Hydrating 3-in-1 Moisturizer is a welcome addition to my daily routine. The product is light, non-greasy and very hydrating to my face and neck. I have been using for the past couple of weeks and notice that my skin feels softer and more refreshed on a daily basis. I recommend this to other people who want a product that is works well and is nicely priced. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have very sensitive skin and a lot of products cause a breakout. I have been using this daily for 2 weeks now and have had any problems. PLUS, the dry skin I normally experience this time of year with the changing weather is much improved. My skin looks great! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like how the Garnier SkinActivr Day/Night Mask makes my face feel. It is really moisturising and soothes my skin. It makes my face feel real smooth and look healthier after use. It's a great mask for combination skin like mine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I washed my face with just soap and water and then applied the Garnier SkinActive. It felt heavy and greasy. I changed it up after a couple days. I washed my face with my Garnier Black Head Remover and then applied the Garnier SkinActive and I immediately noticed a difference! My skin felt instantly smoother and it didn't feel heavy or greasy. It took some trial and error but I'm pleased with the results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It is great to find a moisturizer that goes on light and doesn't feel greasy. Garnier has made a great mask to use any time of the day, and the natural aloe makes it smell and feel amazing! I used this twice a day for several weeks, and my skin feels softer than ever. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The first thing I loved about this cream was that it didn't feel extremely greasy on my face. I have sensitive skin and have lately had dry patches on my face. After using this cream for a bit I've noticed how smooth and silky my face felt. I would recommend this cream to family and friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream really hydrates the skin. I put it on one night and forgot to use it the next day but my skin still felt silky smooth and hydrated. One of the things I love about it is that its not greasy like many creams. I like that its almost all natural derived so you know your not putting a bunch of chemicals on your face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product! It has easily made its way into my daily routine. I have been using Garnier Aloe Hydrating 3-in-1 Moisturizer for the last couple weeks now and it has left me feeling refreshed every day. It leaves my skin feeling soft, and the smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After 10 day of using Garnier Aloe Hydrating 3-in-1 Moisturizer it does a beautiful job of moisturizing and soothing your skin. It goes on creamy not greasy makes my skin feel vibrant and smooth. I'm very excited over this moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought that this was a really good product, BUT i already have really oily skin and I didn't need something to make my skin more hydrated. Unlike other products, this one made my face feel clean and not more oily afterwards. If you have issues with dry skin i would recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have only started using this a couple days ago but it makes my face feel smooth (not greasy.) I hope it will continue to do well with my face as I seem to break out easily. Luckily, that hasn't happened with this product as of yet (fingers crossed [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product works well for moisturizing skin. It's easy to apply and isn't too greasy making it a really solid product. The only thing I didn't like about was the smell. It kind of smells like a strange form of aloe but not completely so it was a little weird. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm loving this moisturizer! From the first smell it's not a strong sent like some products, it smells very mild . it's very light and not tacky while drying . From the first moment I put it on I could feel the difference,, my skin was softer then ever and I can tell when I don't use it . It works excellent on my patches of eczema I could tell the difference within days . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Since I have sensitive scream, I was a bit skeptical. The first day I tried the cream I felt it a bit too creamy, but after I started noticing the change in my skin I was sold. It took about four days to see a difference. My skin looked fresh and toned. Definitely a cream I would recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is definitely not greasy feeling. I would say it felt more slippery. It seemed like it absorbed quickly after application. However, when I showered in the morning after applying it the night before, my face felt slippery again as soon as it was wet. So, I feel like it did not absorb, rather sat on the surface of my skin. After using this product morning and night for a week, my skin feels softer. I love that it is natural, and it did not irritate my skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Its not just a day/night face hydrating cream, it's also a moisturizing cleansing mask! It's great for when I'm in a rush in the morning or just don't feel like worrying about the hassle of taking off all of my makeup at night time. It works wonders in keeping my face healthy and I don't know how I have lasted so long without it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought this three days ago. Can't say anything about the product at this point other than it hydrates the skin. However the smell is too strong and made me feel very uncomfortable. I'm going to return it. I would switch moisture rescue gel from garnier.

This Garnier moisturizer is perfect for me. I'm a working mom so I don't have too much time for a beauty regimen. This moisturizer is light, absorbs quickly, leaves my skin soft and its scent isn't overwhelming- all important things when you get kisses from a toddler. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier's new moisturizer is great. It's 97% natural and has no harsh chemicals and no harsh smell. It looks like a lotion but goes on as a gel. For the past 12 days since there is no SPF in it i have only used it as a nighttime moisturizer, which it's perfect for. It makes my skin feel super soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the fact that it's mostly made of natural ingredients. I could feel the hydrating effect when I used the cream. There are several problems I faced though. First of all, I was not a big fan of the scent. Sometimes it smells like aloe vera or cucumber but not in a good way. Also, the cream started peeling off in a gross way when I put sunscreen sometime after having put on the cream. Lastly, the packaging was not very secure. Just a flimsy tape over it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

woman's face should feel. The Garnier SkinActive moisturizer leaves a silky feeling on my skin and is not heavy like others I've tried. After a few days of use, I feel as though my skin has a more even look to it as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used this product for 1 week. After the first application I could feel the difference in my skin. My skin is softer and hydrated. I am very impressed with the fact that my face will not sweat after application. Very important for the Louisiana girl!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garner Skin Active Hydrating 3-In-1 Moisturizer feels wonderful on my skin. I have been applying the product in the morning and at night before bed. This product has left my skin feeling soft, and smooth not to mention I love the smell of this product. The moisturizer leaves my skin without a greasy feeling and absorbs perfectly into my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I will definitely buy this again! This has aloe juice and love the natural ingredients in the cream! I have used it nightly and as a mask once since the weather is getting colder in Chicago! I have not had any breakouts and my skin feels softer. A little goes a long way. I also plan on taking it on vacation with me in case I get sunburn! Absolutely love the ingredients and would use this on my toddlers! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

In my complete honest opinion upon the aloe hydrating 3-in-1 moisturizer, I was not the biggest fan at first. I have very dry skin, especially when it comes to fall/winter. I didn't give up on it right away though, instead I kept trying it each night before I went to bed and my skin hasn't been as dry as it usually is! I loved how it was silky rather than oily on my skin too! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Works well for my combination skin, it is not only and absorbs well, feels great under mate makeup. Kept my skin moisturized through the night and felt great in the morning. It doesn't have a strong odor. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great product. I gave this product a try on a whim and so glad I did because its amazing. I have dry skin and this works great without making my skin oily. Definatly reccomend the next time your looking for a hydrating moisturizer. Would not reccomend if you have oily skin already. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Really like the Garnier line of products, but this product was not for me. The moisturizer seemed to set on top of my skin and never soak in. I have combination skin, leaning to oily. After a few days use blemishes were starting. Anyone with drier skin would have better results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've only been using using the cream for a week now but it really is amazing! My skin feels and looks great. The smell and texture are great and it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy like alot of other products do. I'm using it in the morning under my makeup and in the evening as my night cream. I would definitely recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product was really usefull. the directions were kind of hard to understand, I wasn't sure how much product to use and if my face needed to be wet prior to application. it made my skin very soft without being greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This face moisturizer/mask could potentially be a life-saver. It's amazing over dry areas or for those with dry skin. It didn't make me break out, but it's a bit too heavy over my more oily areas. The light, natural scent is pleasant and not overpowering. Knowing its ingredients are 97% naturally derived is a huge plus. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I buy garier products already but, this one is my favorite. This product leaves your skin really soft. The product doesn't have a beautiful scent but it smells more natural which, is good. I can see the difference in my skin without using it and using it. I definitely recommend this product to eveyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this product is wonderful! I have always had a problem in my T-zone area. With a 10 minute hydration mask, this plumps my skin right up. I wish that it was suggested to be applied around the eye area too. This is a product that I will definitely be purchasing in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

For people who have dry skin but do not want to apply moisturizers that makes their face look oily and dark, Garnier skin active is the best choice. Only small quantities are required to be applied and my skin stays hydrated almost all through the day. I have a sensitive nose and do not want strong smelling creams but also do not want an odorless one, this mild smelling moisturizer seemed like a pretty good middle ground for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like Garnier's Skin Active Moisturizer. It's not greasy or oily so no shiny face from using it.It absorbs quickly into my skin leaving my skin feeling really soft. Nice pleasant smell. I love that it is made from natural ingredients. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This stuff was awesome! It left my skin feeling so super soft. I used it before bed after washing my face and when I woke up in the morning my skin still felt super soft. It was very lightweight and breathable, I didn't feel like my skin was being weighed down. I would totally recommend this stuff! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using Garnier's 3-in-1 moisturizer for almost two weeks and I can't really feel a difference. It was never clear before to me what this product was intended to do. I think maybe it didn't work because I've never really had a problem with dry or flaky skin before. Though I don't doubt this may do the job for someone with such skin problems. It's worth a shot. I do love that it's natural! Also, it's very easy to use too much of this stuff... Just a few small dabs will do.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I Love the way this product makes my skin feel soft, It doesn't dry out my skin like other products. I'm not a real big fan of the smell. But the over all experience is good. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. I have had people compliment me on my skin since using the Garnier SkinActive. I love that it doesn't feel greasy on the skin, like other products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer works fantastic! My favorite thing to do is apply a thick layer and let it sit for 10 minutes, it leaves my fave unbelievably silly smooth. I have sensitive skin and it does work well when I apply a thin layer as a daily moisturizer. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a new moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the way this moisturizer smells. It has a soft,fresh green scent that disappears as it absorbs into your face and neck. It is nice that is has 97% naturally derived ingredients, but it really works too. It really it great for day, night or as a mask. Great moisturizer that feels light on my combination skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think that this product is well worth the money. I used it a few times as a mask but mostly as my daily moisturizer. I can really tell a difference in the way my face feels. I have oily/dry skin and this product did great. It left my skin feeling moisturized but not greasy or oily whatsoever. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just used it for the first time and so far I must say I am impressed it is smooth and milky going on and like it said it rubs in quickly my skin feels soft hydrated and silky after using it not greasy at all will definitely be adding this to my daily and weekly routine so far I love it and it was quick to apply and literally took just a tiny bit to get my whole face and the fact that the ingredients are all natural makes it even better just love it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really wanted to like this product. It feels nice to apply and has a pleasant scent. It does moisturize my skin. The only negative is enough for me to not enjoy using this product. It leaves a film on my skin. If I touch my face to much or try to rub in the cream to much it rolls into goopy little balls. I wouldn't want to wear this cream in the morning for that reason. At night when you will wash it off before going out in the morning is a better time to use this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Awesome!!! This product is a keeper. Haven't had a moisturizer this good in a while. This product is a 3 in 1 day/night-mask made for sensitive skin and contains aloe juice which helps keep the skin hydrated. It doesn't have a strong scent which is also awesome because scent can be overpowering. I used this product for a week and I've noticed softness and hydration in my skin again!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mask is amazing, when I first saw this mask I was a little skeptical, but when I tried it, my mind was blown ! It's super easy to put on, hydraites my face, and smells soooo good! I would definitely recommend this mask to any one with dry skin, because it really does work! The only thing I would want to know before I get this product? Is where can I buy it once I love it?!? [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive is 3-in-1 day/night/mask. It's made with aloe and without parabenes and silicones! And it's Vegan! I love that it's more natural and it does hydrate your skin! I don't particularly like the smell, but I bet others love it: it's fresh and it almost smells like a fresh cucumber. I have oily skin so use Garnier SkinActive as night moisturizer or as a mask. It's too hydrating, for me to use it during the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this product is ok. I have dry skin and I don't feel like it really kept me moisturized though the day. When I put it on at night it works great but in the morning when I use it I feel my skin is dry during the day.i recommend this for an overnight moisturizer and not a day moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have always struggled with acne and I have to be SO careful about what I use. But I jumped in any ways and I'm glad I did. My fave felt smooth and freash and it didn't feel heavy! I love this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product was great. I washed my face at night before bed. It left my face moisturized. I have dry skin and the acne cream I use dries it out a little more dry. But, Garnier Skin Active did just what it says, kept my skin moisturized and active. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have use your product for about a week and love the results. My face is alot softer. I was worried that it might make my acne worse but that was not the case at all. It was also great to use at night . It did not make my face oily at all. Which I loved. I will definitely use this product again. And I will recommend you anyone. Thanks [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this product for a week and a half. I must say I am impressed! It was creamy and moist, but not oily. It does what it says. I have dry skin patches on my face and most products leave my skin oily. This is a product I would purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It smells nice and feels nice when you put it on. I used it as a night cream after washing my face. My face was oily in the morning though. I think it would be a good moisturizer for someone with very dry skin. Mine is more combination/oily so I don't think it's a good product for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the Garnier SkinActive Hydrating moisturizer for a week now. I love it! It does not have a strong smell which I like. I use it in the mornings, it absorbs into your skin quickly and works really well under my make up. At night, after I take my make up off, I put it on before I go to bed. My face feels very soft! It works well under my eyes and makes them feel very hydrated. I love it! This is definitely a keeper for me! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is one of the best creams I've tried, it makes your skin feel soft and supple, I put it in at night before bed and in the morning when washing my face I can still feel the moisture in my skin! Will be great when winter weather kicks in and dry heat in the house drys out your skin, I believe this will keep your skin from getting that dried out look, even during the day. I would recommend this to anyone who suffers from a dry complexion!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product made my combination skin very soft and smooth but not greasy. It is wearable day and night and went well under make up. I would recommend for hydration and balancing of combination skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow! What an amazing product! I have been using this for a week now my skin feels so smooth and looks so much better! Whats great is you can put it on in the morning after your shower and do a mask in the evening. I would defiantly recommend this to anyone with any skin type it does not make your skin oily and it makes you shine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a wonderful moisturizer! I have really dry skin at my T-zone and a lot of other products just sit on my skin. This does not. It soaks into your skin and makes it so supple! It's so versatile too. I use it any time, day or night. I've honestly replaced my night creams with this. It doesn't clog my pores and it's feels so luxurious on my skin. I'm officially hooked! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am loving this product! It does not irritate my sensitive skin, and I love how soft my skin feels. I have used it as a moisturizer and as a mask. No burning, no itching...goes on cool, and I find it to be very relaxing! My only concern was that the directions weren't clear. I had to go to the Garnier website to clearly understand. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think it's a great product! I have super sensitive skin that dries out a lot especially around this time of year, so I've been using it every morning and night like suggested and my skin is smooth, clear and I absolutely love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Garnier 3-in-1 moisturizer is great! When I first opened it the scent didn't bowl me over. It wasn't unpleasant just nothing exciting. I couldn't wait to try it. I washed my face first then applied it. It smelled great once I actually put it on...and it isn't greasy or oily. It left my skin feeling amazing and looking better and more hydrated. After using it for a few days my skin feels soft and smooth. What a great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Usually I can't use many products without my skin breaking out due to high sensitivity. I have been using this product for over one week and no break outs at all. My skin feels light and hydrated. There is a fresh glow in my skin. I love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have officially added this cream to my daily routine! Whether I am applying in the morning before my make up, in the evening before bed or for a nourishing mask to lift my complexion, this 3-in-1 is my new go-to! I have been telling everyone about it!
